sections.In the books: There is no mention of a traveller in the books. The noise Brienne and Jaime made while fighting was what led to their capture by a dozen of the Brave Companions, a sellsword company led by Vargo Hoat, the book counterpart of Locke.

{{Quote|That's him, all right. I saw him fight at the [[Tournament|tourney]] for Ser [[Willem Frey]]'s [[Marriage|wedding]].|The Riverlands traveller to [[Locke]]|Dark Wings, Dark Words}}
A '''Riverlands traveller''' is a minor character in the [[Season 3|third season]]. He is portrayed by [[Joe Purcell]] and appears in "[[Dark Wings, Dark Words]]".
sections.Biography:
===Background===
He is a peasant who travels through [[The Riverlands|the Riverlands]] to trade and sell.

===[[Season 3]]===
He saw [[Jaime Lannister]] and [[Brienne of Tarth]] travel in the Riverlands, and tipped them off to [[Locke]]. Locke commands the [[House Bolton|Bolton]] men to give him the reward.<ref>"[[Dark Wings, Dark Words]]"</ref>
